ComicInfo.Title: Murder's Better the Second Time Around!
ComicInfo.Summary: Murder's Better the Second Time Around!: The son of the original Crime-Master and the daughter of the Big Man seek revenge against Spider-Man and the Human Torch.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:45:45. [Issue ID 29329]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority

ComicInfo.Inker: Mike Esposito,Sal Buscema,Dave Hunt,Mike Esposito,Dave Hunt
